Get In Touch

Page Purpose –

Shown to a user following the submission of content, this page should serve as a comfirmation and then provide a lauchcing off point to more information.

Keeping engagement on other channels and retaining contact will be important.

Section: intro

We got you

Never an optional page! Include postal address, phone number, email and links to social media. If you have a bricks and mortar location, list your opening hours.

Remember: people are often getting in touch to complain or ask for support, so be empathetic here: the language is clear and polite – and here to help.
